movies.title: Gun Crazy: Episode 2 - Beyond the Law

biography.bio: Rei Kikukawa was born on February 28, 1978 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Jôhô Presenter Tokudane! (1999), Minna de Garireo! Saiensu adobenchâ in Nagoyashi kagakukan (2011) and Shinso hodo bankisha! (2002).
biography.name: Rei Kikukawa

biography.bio: Toshiya Nagasawa was born on September 6, 1961 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shinobi: Heart Under Blade (2005), Les Lucioles (2000) and Owls' Castle (1999). He was previously married to Yumi Asô.
biography.name: Toshiya Nagasawa

biography.bio: Kôji Shimizu was born on February 11, 1944 in Kyoto Prefecture, Japan. He is an actor and executive, known for Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980), Supernova Flashman (1986) and La chambre noire (1983).
biography.name: Kôji Shimizu

biography.bio: Eugene Nomura was born on May 2, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and producer, known for 800 Two Lap Runners (1994), Sleepy Heads (1997) and Waiting for the Sun (2008). He has been married to Eri Imai since October 1999. They have one child.
biography.name: Eugene Nomura

biography.bio: Takashi Matsuyama was born on April 2, 1960 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), The Grudge (2004) and The Wolverine (2013).
biography.name: Takashi Matsuyama

biography.bio: Shuri Takahashi is an actress, known for Gun Crazy: Episode 2 - Beyond the Law (2002).
biography.name: Shuri Takahashi

biography.bio: Yûki Tanaka is an actor, known for Gun Crazy: Episode 2 - Beyond the Law (2002), Godzilla 2000 (1999) and Kike wadatsumi no koe Last Friends (1995).
biography.name: Yûki Tanaka

biography.bio: Kaori Shimamura was born on January 27, 1971 in Yamaguchi, Japan as Kaori Matsumoto. She is an actress, known for Moon Angel (1996), Gun Crazy: Episode 2 - Beyond the Law (2002) and Legend of the Devil (1996).
biography.name: Kaori Shimamura

biography.bio: Shigeo Kobayashi was born on April 21, 1970 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Sacrifices of War (2011), Flower and Snake (2004) and Gun Crazy: Episode 2 - Beyond the Law (2002).
biography.name: Shigeo Kobayashi

biography.bio: Michihiro Yamanishi was born on March 7, 1948 in Hyogo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Detective Story (1979), XX: Utsukushiki hyôteki (1995) and Shokei yugi (1979).
biography.name: Michihiro Yamanishi

biography.bio: Ryûshi Mizukami was born on December 26, 1964 in Toyama, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for The Thin Red Line (1998), Ringu 0 (2000) and Onibi, le démon (1997).
biography.name: Ryûshi Mizukami

biography.bio: Daisuke Iijima is an actor, known for Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence (1983), One Missed Call (2003) and Freeze Me (2000).
biography.name: Daisuke Iijima

biography.bio: Naoyuki Chiba is an actor, known for When I Need You Most (2004), Naughty Boys (2001) and Renzoku furin: Shimai sôkanzu (2008).
biography.name: Naoyuki Chiba

biography.bio: Yûken Yoshida is an actor, known for Shin Nihon erobanashi: Hitozuma ryûgûjô (2003), Chikan ero chitai: Densha, benjo, kôen (1998) and Hotel jô: Iyashi no te hodoki (2006).
biography.name: Yûken Yoshida

biography.bio: Guy Harvey is an actor, known for Sakura Wars (2000), Petite Princess Yucie (2002) and Dai-Guard (1999).
biography.name: Guy Harvey
